attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252552. This vehicle comes with a balance of 3year/unlimited kms service plan, warranty and roadside assistance. This is the ideal vehicle for the first time buyer. It boasts with its zippy yet economical 1. 5 litre engine. Vehicle has some exciting features that include Handsfree Bluetooth, radio/cd, aircon, power steering, electric windows together with a multi-function steering wheel, Infotainment, and more. The vehicles interior and exterior is in immaculate condition. Book your test drive with us today.

The price excludes dealer fees and smash and grab protection film. Call us today to arrange a test drive. Errors and omissions Reserved.
T&Cs apply.
